alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:11AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Charles and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 1145 AM CDT... At 1111 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Destrehan, or near Hahnville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Metairie, Norco, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, Taft, New Sarpy, St. Rose and New Orleans Armstrong Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 213 and 226. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
